hero.description1: Abdul-Ali Al-Ajmi Company has specialized since its establishment in 1980 in the field of road and bridge construction and maintenance, infrastructure, worksite preparation, real estate plans development, and land transport services. , the border guards, the Ministry of Municipal and Rural Affairs, the private real estate sector, and others, and the Abdul Ali Al-Ajmi Company was known as a major company in the field of road construction throughout the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
hero.description2: TAbdul Ali Al-Ajmi Company was established in 1980 and has taken its main headquarters in the city of Riyadh and has expanded its business and established branches in Hofuf and Jaffa.

services.title: Our Services
